synopsis: In episode #12 of PBR, hosts Devam and Ahir welcome the talented musician Valante, who shares his inspiring journey from childhood struggles to creative expression. The conversation delves into the importance of presence, the challenges of navigating life and relationships, and the beauty of simply existing, all while enjoying Valante's calming music.
quotes: If you want to make the world a better place, take a look at yourself and make a change.
Just because you're not giving up all of your possessions doesn't mean you're not helping and being kind.
Life needs to happen for a while in order for me to have something to express.
It takes a village to raise a child.
You can always find a reason to feel guilty about your own privilege.
It's difficult to not project your idea of love onto another human being.
You can mess around on the piano or the guitar for two hours, and maybe make the world's greatest song that nobody ever gets to hear.
The moment we come back from a trip, all of our suitcases are immediately unpacked.
You could just lay on the bed and be like, why doesn't everybody just lay on the bed? This is the greatest thing ever.
